comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15329?focusedCommentId=17478195) by Will Jones (willjones127):*
`[~kszucs]` I think `[~jorisvandenbossche]` is wanting to get this into 7.0 if we can. This is a temporary change and I plan on getting ARROW-14798 and ARROW-15363 in 8.0.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15329?focusedCommentId=17478199) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Though this is a valuable feature, the issue is classified as a _minor_ _improvement_. 

Postponing to 8.0 means that shouldn't _block_ the 7.0 release on this issue, but going to include if the patch gets merged before the release procedure begins.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15329?focusedCommentId=17567302) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
This issue has been inactive for 3 months, so it has been unassigned and marked as unstarted. If you are still working on this, feel free to reassign yourself and resume progress.
